newProfileForm.characters:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the current character count out of the maximum allowed for the bio field
**UI Location**: Profile creation form â†’ beneath Bio field
**When Users See This**: When creating a new profile, specifically when entering text into the bio field
**Technical Context**: Variable `length` must remain unchanged. It represents the current number of characters.
**Current English**: "%{length} / 160 characters"
